title: Samsonite Logo Font?
content:
Hi all

I'm trying to identify the typeface used in the logo of Samsonsite. Any help will be greatly appreciated.

Clinton

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415115007im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Samsonite-Logo-GC_6101.jpg)
author: cisfor

comments.content: Hmm. Is it just me, or is this different from their current wordmark? Anyway, [Magistral](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415115007/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/magistral/) is close (though not it).
